document_data.name: Goris Ballast
document_data.mainbody:
'''Goris Ballast''' was a guest of [[Nortale's Hostel]] in the [[Baldur's Gate/Lower City|Lower City]] of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|''Good luck getting some kip up here. I'd stuff your ears if I were you.''|Goris Ballast}}
document_data.Description: Goris was a dark-skinned and clean-shaven [[gold dwarf]] man with navy-blue eyes, bulbous nose, and curly black hair.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, during the [[Absolute crisis]], and the city of Baldur's Gate being flooded with refugees, Goris Ballast was among the guests of Nortale's Hostel that offered lodgings to refugees. The dwarf's bunk was located in the hostel's second floor, however ht complained about the boisterous and loud neighbors, yet he appreciated the place's safety.
